title: Lisa Snowdon, 47, shows off curves in a flirty star-print wrap dress as she attends fashion event
text:
She is known for her sensational sense of style.

And Lisa Snowdon looked incredible as she attended a Carvela styling event at Westfield White City on Friday afternoon.

The presenter, 47, showcased her famous curves in a black star-print dress which flashed a glimpse of her toned legs.

Gorgeous: Lisa Snowdon, 47, looked incredible as she attended a Carvela styling event at Westfield White City on Friday afternoon

Lisa's wrap dress plunged slightly down the middle and put emphasis on her toned waist.

She boosted her height in a pair of sparkling silver ankle boots as she posed away at the event.

Lisa made the most of her youthful features with a simple slick of make-up, which complemented her sleek long brunette tresses.

The beauty was seen without her beau fiancé George Smart, 40.

Style: The presenter showcased her famous curves in a black star-print dress which flashed a glimpse of her toned legs

Fashionista: Lisa's wrap dress plunged slightly down the middle and put emphasis on her toned waist

Lisa recently said she didn't have any intention of having children because she doesn't want to add any pressure to a relationship that is 'perfect the way it is'.

Speaking to The Sun on Sunday's Fabulous magazine, the model said: 'I value our relationship so much that I don't want anything to change and I don't want to put that added pressure on him ore me, because it would.

'I could do it a different way, but I don't want to. I'm very much a believer in fate and I think that George and I are very lucky to have each other.

Standing tall: She boosted her height in a pair of sparkling silver ankle boots as she posed away at the event

'We're just really happy with out lot, which is so hard for people to understand. It's so hard because everyone's always like: ''You can adopt'. I'm like, 'Really? I had no idea.''

The model and presenter first dated George 18 years ago when they both worked for MTV, but it wasn't until the pair were reintroduced to each other through a mutual friend four years ago that their relationship was rekindled.

In January 2017, the couple announced they were engaged after George proposed to Lisa just five weeks after she left the 2016 series of I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out of Here.

Beauty: Lisa made the most of her youthful features with a simple slick of make-up, which complemented her sleek long brunette tresses

Detailing the romantic proposal, Lisa has previously described how George presented her with 'the most beautiful diamond ring' at their home after 14 months of dating.

In 2017 Lisa went on to describe how George was her best friend and shared her belief that they were 'meant to be together'.

Speaking to Hello Magazine she said: 'Yes, at some point (we will marry). But there’s no pressure because we fit … I know we’ll be together forever...

'He’s my best friend. He’s understanding, nurturing and thoughtful and he gets me beyond anyone I’ve ever met before.

'He cares about me and I care about him. It feels like we were meant to be together
